F

flipAll(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Method used after the check() function that Flips all possible moves for the clr colored disk at (r,c) check functions must be used to populate the data field that flipAll() relies on
flipXN(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the negative x direction
flipXNYN(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the third quadrant Checks for out of bounds errors so that row can be greater than, equal to, or less than column
flipXNYP(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the second quadrant Checks for out of bounds errors so that row can be greater than, equal to, or less than column
flipXP(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the positive x direction
flipXPYN(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the fourth quadrant Checks for out of bounds errors so that row can be greater than, equal to, or less than column
flipXPYP(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the first quadrant Checks for out of bounds errors so that row can be greater than, equal to, or less than column
flipYN(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the negative y direction
flipYP(int, int, String) - Method in class game.Rules
Makes any possible flips in the positive y direction
